battle

Class TurnOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • battle.TurnOrder

  • public class TurnOrder
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks time within a battle and advances items that produce events as time continues forward.
    Author:
    Andrew M. Teller(https://github.com/AndrewMiTe)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime
      Keeps track of the date and time of the most current turn.
      int PASS_LIMIT
      Limits the number of passes performed on a single instant of time where the interactions of skills ready to execute and statuses applied might interact indefinitely.
      private java.time.LocalDateTime startTime
      The date and time at the start of the battle.
      private java.util.ArrayList<battle.TurnItem> turnList
      An list of objects that can be sorted as items in the turn order.

        Initializes the turn order using the current date and time as the start of the battle.

      • TurnOrder

        public TurnOrder(java.time.LocalDateTime startTime)
        Initializes the turn order using a given parameter as the starting date and time of the battle. Attempting to initiate the start time value as null will throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        startTime - starting date and time.

    • Method Detail

      • addTurnItem

        public void addTurnItem(battle.TurnItem item)
        Adds an item to the turn order. Attempting to set the item as null will throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        item - the turn item to add.

      • removeTurnItem

        public boolean removeTurnItem(battle.TurnItem item)
        Removes an item from the turn order.
        Parameters:
        item - the turn item to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the item was removed.

      • removeActor

        public boolean removeActor(battle.Actor actor)
        Removes all TurnItem objects from the turn order matching that are owned by a given Fighter object.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor of the items to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if a match to the given fighter was found and removed.

      • advanceToNext

        public boolean advanceToNext()
        Advances to the next point in time where at least one successful event occurs. After time is incrementally advanced to the point where one or more turn item report an event, such as the expiration of a status or the execution of a skill, all turns are given an additional pass to report if new events result from the changes to the state of the battle. These passes will continue until either all interactions have played themselves out or until the passes exceed PASS_LIMIT. If the pass limit is exceeded or if there are no turn items beyond the current time, the method returns false, which indicates that the battle should be concluded, likely with no one being the victor.
        Returns:
        true if time has advanced to a successful event. A false value indicates that the battle should be concluded.

      • advanceAll

        public void advanceAll()
        Advances the turn order until it has determined that successful events can no longer occur.

      • getCurrentTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getCurrentTime()
        Getter for the current time of the battle.
        Returns:
        date and time value.

      • getStartTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getStartTime()
        Getter for the start time of the battle.
        Returns:
        date and time value.

      • sortTurnItems

        private void sortTurnItems()
        Sorts the turn order in descending order based on the time that events are due.
